controllers

Class MapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.MapController

  • public class MapController
extends java.lang.Object
    MapController is a class to manage the map and all methods related to it. It consists of a 2D array of cells and contains the methods required to alter and manipulate them

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int height 
      int width

                     int width,

      • getCell

                    int y)
        Returns cell at location in cellArray
        Parameters:
        x - The x value of desired cell
        y - The y value of the desired cell
        Returns:
        the Cell at map[y][x]

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell(Vector pos)
        Returns cell at location of a vector
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the cell to return
        Returns:
        The Cell at the position of the vector given in the map.

      • getNextCell

        public Cell getNextCell(Vector pos,
                        Direction dir)
        Returns the next cell in a certain direction from the cell at a certain position.
        Parameters:
        pos - position vector of the cell
        dir - direction of the next cell
        Returns:
        Cell in the direction given from the position given.

      • openDoor

        public void openDoor(int x,
                     int y)
        Changes a door at a given location to a empty cell
        Parameters:
        x - The x value of desired door
        y - The y value of the desired door

      • exportMap

        public java.lang.String[] exportMap(EntityController ec)
        Exports the current map state as a string array to allow for game saving
        Parameters:
        ec - The EntityController needed to export specific characters in the main map definition
        Returns:
        String[]

      • exportSpecific

        public java.lang.String[] exportSpecific()
        Method to export the specifics of certain map cells
        Returns:
        a string array of the map's specifics

      • autotile

        public void autotile()
        Uses the AssetBuilder class to determine the asset needed for the cell based on the cells surroundings.

      • renderMap

        public javafx.scene.layout.GridPane renderMap()
        Method to render the map to the screen centred on the player's location
        Returns:
        The GridPane consisting of panes of each Cell.

      • linkTeleporters

        public void linkTeleporters(java.util.Scanner sc)
        Takes a scanner and gets 2 X coordinates and 2 Y coordinates of the two Teleporters and links them together.
        Parameters:
        sc - The scanner used to retrieve the values.

      • initDoor

        public void initDoor(java.util.Scanner sc)
        Retrieves the position of the door and the token value and sets the tokens.
        Parameters:
        sc - The scanner used to retrieve the values.

                            int y,
                            char c)
        Method to create Cells based on the input character from a read map file
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the cell
        y - y coordinate of the cell
